Interface w3c.thotlib.Action

public interface interface Action
Java template for classes used to provide "user defined" specific actions. E.g. to redefine of extend the action of a menu item.

The class callback is called when the action for witch it was registered occurs. If the handling is complete, it should return a zero value. Otherwise, the built-in callback for this action is called upon completion of the user one.

An action can register various kind of callback depending on the context in which these should be called :

- int callbackMenu(int document, int view);

- int callbackNotify(int event);

- int callbackDialog(int event, int document, int view);

- int callbackWindow(int event, int document, int view, int verticalValue, int horizontalValue);

- int callbackAttribute(int event, int document, long element, long attribute, long sschema, int type);

- int callbackElement(int event, int document, long element, long sschema, int type, int position);

- int callbackElementType(int event, int document, long element, long newsschema, int newtype, long sschema, int type);

- int callbackTarget(int event, int document, long element, long target, int targetdocument);

- int callbackValue(int event, int document, long element, long target, int value);

- int callbackPresentation(int event, int document, long element, long pRule, int pRuleType);

callbackAttribute(int, int, long, long, long, int)
Callback when a Attribute type event occurs.
callbackDialog(int, int, int)
Callback when a Dialog type event occurs.
callbackElement(int, int, long, long, int, int)
Callback when a Element type event occurs.
callbackElementType(int, int, long, long, int, long, int)
Callback when a ElementType type event occurs.
callbackMenu(int, int)
Callback when the action is called from a menu.
callbackNotify(int)
Callback when a Notify type event occurs.
callbackPresentation(int, int, long, long, int)
Callback when a Presentation type event occurs.
callbackTarget(int, int, long, long, int)
Callback when a Target type event occurs.
callbackValue(int, int, long, long, int)
Callback when a Value type event occurs.
callbackWindow(int, int, int, int, int)
Callback when a Window type event occurs.
register(String)
The register method exports the class callback when the action "ActionName" is to be called from the editor kernel.
registerMenu(String)
The registerMenu method exports the class callback when the action "ActionName" is to be called from a Menu.

register 
 public abstract void register(String ActionName)
The register method exports the class callback when the action "ActionName" is to be called from the editor kernel.

Parameters:
ActionName - the name under which the callback is registered
registerMenu 
 public abstract void registerMenu(String ActionName)
The registerMenu method exports the class callback when the action "ActionName" is to be called from a Menu.

callbackMenu 
 public abstract int callbackMenu(int document,
                                  int view)
Callback when the action is called from a menu.

Parameters:
document - the document number in which the menu was selected
view - the view number in which the menu was selected
Returns:
zero if the action handled the event, non-zero if the default handling should take place.
callbackNotify 
 public abstract int callbackNotify(int event)
Callback when a Notify type event occurs.

Parameters:
event - the event type TteXXX as defined in w3c.thotlib.APIAppAction
Returns:
zero if the action handled the event, non-zero if the default handling should take place.
callbackDialog 
 public abstract int callbackDialog(int event,
                                    int document,
                                    int view)
Callback when a Dialog type event occurs.

Parameters:
event - the event type TteXXX as defined in w3c.thotlib.APIAppAction
document - the document number in which the event occured
view - the view number in which the event occured
Returns:
zero if the action handled the event, non-zero if the default handling should take place.
callbackWindow 
 public abstract int callbackWindow(int event,
                                    int document,
                                    int view,
                                    int verticalValue,
                                    int horizontalValue)
Callback when a Window type event occurs.

Parameters:
event - the event type TteXXX as defined in w3c.thotlib.APIAppAction
document - the document number in which the event occured
view - the view number in which the event occured
verticalValue - extra information on vertical position
horizontalValue - extra information on horizontal position
Returns:
zero if the action handled the event, non-zero if the default handling should take place.
callbackAttribute 
 public abstract int callbackAttribute(int event,
                                       int document,
                                       long element,
                                       long attribute,
                                       long sschema,
                                       int type)
Callback when a Attribute type event occurs.

Parameters:
event - the event type TteXXX as defined in w3c.thotlib.APIAppAction
document - the document number in which the event occured
view - the view number in which the event occured
element - the element holding the attribute
attribute - the attribute generating the event
sschema - the Structure Schema of this attribute
type - the Attribute type
Returns:
zero if the action handled the event, non-zero if the default handling should take place.
callbackElement 
 public abstract int callbackElement(int event,
                                     int document,
                                     long element,
                                     long sschema,
                                     int type,
                                     int position)
Callback when a Element type event occurs.

Parameters:
event - the event type TteXXX as defined in w3c.thotlib.APIAppAction
document - the document number in which the event occured
view - the view number in which the event occured
element - the element generating the event
sschema - the Structure Schema of this element
type - the element type
position - extra information for Delete event.
Returns:
zero if the action handled the event, non-zero if the default handling should take place.
callbackElementType 
 public abstract int callbackElementType(int event,
                                         int document,
                                         long element,
                                         long newsschema,
                                         int newtype,
                                         long sschema,
                                         int type)
Callback when a ElementType type event occurs.

Parameters:
event - the event type TteXXX as defined in w3c.thotlib.APIAppAction
document - the document number in which the event occured
view - the view number in which the event occured
element - the element generating the event
sschema - the new Structure Schema of this element
type - the new element type
sschema - the current Structure Schema of this element
type - the current element type
Returns:
zero if the action handled the event, non-zero if the default handling should take place.
callbackTarget 
 public abstract int callbackTarget(int event,
                                    int document,
                                    long element,
                                    long target,
                                    int targetdocument)
Callback when a Target type event occurs.

Parameters:
event - the event type TteXXX as defined in w3c.thotlib.APIAppAction
document - the document number in which the event occured
view - the view number in which the event occured
element - the element generating the event
target - the element receiving the event
targetdocument - the document of the element receiving the event
Returns:
zero if the action handled the event, non-zero if the default handling should take place.
callbackValue 
 public abstract int callbackValue(int event,
                                   int document,
                                   long element,
                                   long target,
                                   int value)
Callback when a Value type event occurs.

Parameters:
event - the event type TteXXX as defined in w3c.thotlib.APIAppAction
document - the document number in which the event occured
view - the view number in which the event occured
element - the element generating the event
target - the element receiving the event
value - extra information for this event
Returns:
zero if the action handled the event, non-zero if the default handling should take place.
callbackPresentation 
 public abstract int callbackPresentation(int event,
                                          int document,
                                          long element,
                                          long pRule,
                                          int pRuleType)
Callback when a Presentation type event occurs.

Parameters:
event - the event type TteXXX as defined in w3c.thotlib.APIAppAction
document - the document number in which the event occured
view - the view number in which the event occured
element - the element generating the event
pRule - the new presentation rule
pRuleType - the new presentation rule type
Returns:
zero if the action handled the event, non-zero if the default handling should take place.
